document.docAuthor: Huber, John T., Read, Jennifer D. & Triapitsyn, Serguei V.
document.masterDocTitle: Illustrated key to genera and catalogue of Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) in America north of Mexico

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Illustrated key to genera and catalogue of Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) in America north of Mexico

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Gonatocerus brunneus var. tenuipennis Girault, 1911
[96]: 263. Holotype (INHS), lost. TL: USA , Illinois , Centralia, Urbana. Synonymy (objective junior synonym) by
Triapitsyn, 2013a: 47
;
Perkins, 1912: 24
(comparison with extralimital species).

Gonatocerus aligarhensis Shamim & Shafee, 1984: 623
. Holotype ♀ (ZDAMU). TL: India , Uttar Pradesh , Aligarh. Synonymy by
Triapitsyn, 2013a: 48
.

Lymaenon chrysis Debauche, 1948: 99
. Holotype ♀ (ISNB). TL: Belgium , Heverlee. Synonymy by
Triapitsyn, 2013a: 47
.

Lymaenon flavus Soyka, 1950b: 127
. Holotype ♀ (PPDD), lost. TL: Egypt , Giza . Synonymy by
Triapitsyn, 2013a: 47
.

Gonatocerus fukuokensis Sahad in Sahad & Hirashima, 1984: 20
. Holotype ♀ (KUEC). TL: Japan , Fukuoka City, Hakozaki. Synonymy by
Triapitsyn, 2013a: 48
.

Gonatocerus gracilentus Hellén, 1974: 11
. Holotype ♀ (FMNH). TL: Finland , Parikkala. Synonymy by
Triapitsyn, 2013a: 48
.

Lymaenon kanheriensis
Mani & Saraswat in Mani et al. , 1973: 87
. Holotype ♀ (USNM). TL: India , Mumbai [ Bombay ], Borivali National Park , below Kanheri Caves. Synonymy by
Zeya & Hayat, 1995: 114
.

Lymaenon pahlgamensis Narayanan, 1960: 25
. Holotype ♀ (INPC). TL: India , Kashmir [Valley]. Synonymy by
Triapitsyn, 2013a: 47
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Nearctic host . Cicadellidae :
Neoaliturus ( Circulifer ) tenellus (Baker)
, under quarantine laboratory conditions only ( Triapitsyn 2013a ).
Distribution . Canada : ON. USA : CA, GA, IL, MD, NC, NY, TX.
